A utility for checking interface version compatibility.

Libraries
iv_util (-liv_util, iv_util.lib)

Headers
#include <iv/base.h>
#include <iv/util.h>

Usage
iv_bool_t
iv_matches(iv_version_t version, iv_version_t req_version)

Check if an interface version implements a required version. For a normal req_version, not 0.x, this will check if the major versions are equal and that the minor version is greater than or equal to the required minor version. For a special req_version, 0.x, the minor versions must be equal to match.

Parameters:
version - The version being checked.
req_version - The required version.
Returns:
IV_TRUE if compatible, IV_FALSE otherwise.
Since:
1.0

See Also
Interface Versioning
